hero.title: Technology for
hero.description: Code for Taiwan is an open civic tech community that brings together developers, designers, and citizens to build digital solutions for government transparency and social good.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: All projects are open source and welcome contributions from the community

community.title: Community Driven
community.description: Diverse community of volunteers working together for social impact

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Innovative solutions for social challenges using modern technology

transparency.title: Government Transparency
transparency.description: Building tools to make government more transparent and accountable

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.subtitle: Discover the digital solutions we're building for Taiwan

about.title: About Code for Taiwan
about.subtitle: Building a better Taiwan through technology and collaboration

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To foster transparency, accountability, and citizen participation in Taiwan through the collaborative development of civic technology.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A Taiwan where technology serves all citizens and enables effective democratic participation.

values.title: Our Values
values.openness: Openness and transparency in all our work

footer.description: Code for Taiwan is part of the global Code for All network, promoting civic technology worldwide.
